channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 美国贸易负责人本周排除了世贸组织争端解决方案，但表示情绪积极
item.description: U.S. Trade Representative Katherine Tai on Wednesday ruled out an agreement on World Trade Organization dispute settlement appeals reform this week but said WTO negotiations on the issue were positive and showing some progress.翻译:美国贸易代表凯瑟琳·戴周三排除了本周就世贸组织争端解决上诉改革达成协议的可能性，但表示世贸组织就此问题的谈判是积极的，并显示出一些进展。
item.author: Alexander Cornwell

item.title: Polestar 融资近 10 亿美元，预计 2024 年利润率将有所改善
item.description: Polestar said on Wednesday it had raised a $950 million loan from a bank syndicate, helping to fill a gap left when Volvo Cars said it would stop funding the electric carmaker, sending its New York-listed shares 18.5% higher.翻译:Polestar周三表示，已从银行财团筹集了9.5亿美元贷款，有助于填补沃尔沃汽车表示将停止向这家电动汽车制造商提供资金后留下的资金缺口，导致其在纽约上市的股价上涨18.5%。
item.author: Marie Mannes

item.title: 印度和南非在世贸组织谈判中阻止投资协议
item.description: India and South Africa have filed a formal objection against an investment agreement at a World Trade Organization meeting in Abu Dhabi, blocking its adoption, a document showed and delegates confirmed on Wednesday.翻译:一份文件显示，代表们周三确认，印度和南非已在阿布扎比举行的世界贸易组织会议上对一项投资协议提出正式反对意见，阻止该协议的通过。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 印度在世贸组织会议上寻求农业和争端制度改革
item.description: India hopes to reach a deal on a key element of agricultural reform as well as the restoration of the World Trade Organization's arbitration powers at a high-level meeting in Abu Dhabi this week, its trade minister said on Wednesday.翻译:印度贸易部长周三表示，印度希望本周在阿布扎比举行的高级别会议上就农业改革的关键内容以及恢复世界贸易组织的仲裁权达成协议。
item.author: Rachna Uppal

item.title: 意大利与特斯拉和中国汽车制造商洽谈寻找第二家汽车生产商
item.description: Italy has been in talks with Tesla and three Chinese carmakers as it tries to attract another manufacturer and reach an annual output target of 1.3 million vehicles, the industry minister said on Wednesday.翻译:意大利工业部长周三表示，意大利一直在与特斯拉和三家中国汽车制造商进行谈判，试图吸引另一家制造商并实现 130 万辆汽车的年产量目标。
item.author: Giuseppe Fonte, Giulio Piovaccari

item.title: 共和党参议员希望提高对中国汽车的关税
item.description: Republican Senator Josh Hawley is introducing on Wednesday legislation to hike tariffs on Chinese vehicle imports amid growing concerns about the impact of these vehicles on U.S. car companies.翻译:由于人们越来越担心这些汽车对美国汽车公司的影响，共和党参议员乔什·霍利周三提出立法，提高对中国汽车的进口关税。
item.author: David Shepardson

item.title: 中国总理李克强敦促加强与美国的经贸关系
item.description: China and the United States should strengthen economic and trade ties and Washington should avoid decoupling from China, Chinese Premier Li Qiang said on Wednesday, during a meeting with a visiting U.S. delegation, Chinese state radio reported.翻译:据中国国家广播电台报道，中国国务院总理李强周三在会见来访的美国代表团时表示，中美应加强经贸关系，华盛顿应避免与中国脱钩。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：美国增长 3% 以上；苹果降档，新西兰惊喜
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 大众汽车称长安汽车前首席软件架构师将出任Cariad中国新任首席执行官
item.description: Volkswagen said on Wednesday that Frank Han, the former chief software architect of Changan Auto, will take over as chief executive of its Cariad China unit on March 1.翻译:大众汽车周三表示，长安汽车前首席软件架构师韩方将于 3 月 1 日接任 Cariad 中国首席执行官。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 拜登将打击美国数据流向中国和俄罗斯
item.description: President Joe Biden's administration on Wednesday unveiled an executive order aimed at protecting American personal data by restricting its transfer to China, Russia and other countries, senior U.S. officials said, citing national security concerns.翻译:美国高级官员表示，出于国家安全考虑，总统拜登政府周三公布了一项行政命令，旨在通过限制向中国、俄罗斯和其他国家传输美国个人数据来保护美国个人数据。
item.author: Alexandra Alper, Kanishka Singh

item.title: 情报局长表示，澳大利亚政客向外国间谍团伙“出卖”了国家
item.description: A former politician "sold out" Australia to a foreign intelligence service, the country's spy chief said on Wednesday, adding that his agency had confronted the spy ring to let them know their cover had been blown.翻译:该国间谍负责人周三表示，一名前政客将澳大利亚“出卖”给了外国情报机构，并补充说，他的机构已与间谍团伙对峙，让他们知道他们的身份已被揭穿。
item.author: Kirsty Needham

item.title: 百度受益于人工智能，第四季度收入增长6%
item.description: China's Baidu , said fourth-quarter revenue rose 6%, helped by gains from its generative AI applications as it ramps up efforts to make money from its investments in the emerging technology.翻译:中国的百度表示，第四季度收入增长了 6%，得益于其生成式人工智能应用程序的收益，该公司加大了从新兴技术投资中赚钱的力度。
item.author: Yelin Mo, Brenda Goh

item.title: 欧洲国家考虑在大流行关闭后重新开放驻朝鲜大使馆
item.description: A German delegation visited the North Korean capital of Pyongyang for the first time since its embassy was shuttered during the pandemic, as other European countries prepare for an anticipated return.翻译:德国代表团自朝鲜大使馆在疫情期间关闭以来首次访问朝鲜首都平壤，而其他欧洲国家则在为预期的回归做准备。
item.author: Josh Smith, Alexander Ratz

item.title: 消息人士称，Kedaara 即将为印度最大的私募基金筹集 17 亿美元
item.description: Kedaara Capital is set to raise $1.7 billion for what would be India's biggest-ever private equity fund, two people with direct knowledge of the matter said, highlighting huge interest in the country's fast-growing economy amid a shift away from China.翻译:两位直接了解情况的人士表示，Kedaara Capital 计划为印度有史以来最大的私募股权基金筹集 17 亿美元，这突显了印度经济从中国转移出去的情况下对该国快速增长的经济的巨大兴趣。
item.author: M. Sriram

item.title: 尽管存在担忧，香港仍采取更严格的安全法
item.description: A public consultation period for a new Hong Kong national security law closes on Wednesday amid concerns that the legislation, which authorities want to put in place soon, will further erode freedoms in the financial hub.翻译:香港新国家安全法的公众咨询期于周三结束，人们担心当局希望尽快实施的这项立法将进一步侵蚀这个金融中心的自由。
item.author: James Pomfret, Jessie Pang

item.title: 香港取消房地产紧缩措施以促进经济复苏
item.description: Hong Kong announced major measures on Wednesday to bolster its flagging real estate market by scrapping all tightening measures for residential properties, aimed at helping the city's economy which is expected to grow at a tepid 2.5%-3.5% this year.翻译:香港周三宣布了重大措施，以提振疲软的房地产市场，取消所有住宅房地产紧缩措施，旨在帮助香港经济今年预计增长 2.5%-3.5%。
item.author: Clare Jim, James Pomfret

item.title: 中国西安将向新婚夫妇发放彩票以刺激生育
item.description: Authorities in China's city of Xian will spend 700,000 yuan ($97,000) on lottery tickets to give as prizes to newlyweds who present a marriage certificate, in an effort to encourage weddings at a time of fewer births.翻译:中国西安市当局将斥资 70 万元人民币（合 97,000 美元）购买彩票，为出示结婚证的新婚夫妇颁发奖品，以鼓励在出生人口较少的时期举行婚礼。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国福建金华公司被美国指控窃取商业机密
item.description: Fujian Jinhua Integrated Circuit Co Ltd was cleared on Tuesday of U.S. allegations that the Chinese chipmaker stole trade secrets, in a case that fanned tensions in an intensifying technology race between the United States and China.翻译:周二，美国对中国芯片制造商福建晋华集成电路有限公司窃取商业机密的指控被澄清，该案加剧了中美之间日益激烈的技术竞赛的紧张局势。
item.author: Kanishka Singh

item.title: 欧佩克+可能减产，油价上涨，但受到美国原油库存上涨的抑制
item.description: Oil prices rose marginally on Wednesday as the prospect of delays to U.S. interest rate cuts and a higher-than expected rise in U.S. crude stocks offset support from a potential extension to OPEC+ supply cuts.翻译:油价周三小幅上涨，因美国降息推迟的前景以及美国原油库存增幅高于预期抵消了欧佩克+供应削减可能延长的支撑。
item.author: Georgina Mccartney

item.title: 碧桂园清算申请加剧中国房地产困境
item.description: Chinese developer Country Garden said on Wednesday a liquidation petition has been filed against it for non-payment of a $205 million loan, clouding its debt revamp prospects and undermining Beijing's effort to restore confidence in the property sector.翻译:中国开发商碧桂园周三表示，已因其未支付2.05亿美元贷款而收到清算申请，这给其债务重组前景蒙上了阴影，并削弱了北京方面恢复房地产行业信心的努力。
item.author: Scott Murdoch, Clare Jim, Yu Xie
